Package jhelp.util.thread

Thread management

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Conditions
    Create and manage conditions for launching thread.
    MessageHandler<MESSAGE>
    Handler of messages.
    MessageHandler.Message<ELEMENT>
    A message
    MessageHandlerTest  
    Mutex
    Mutex (Mutual Exclusion) for synchronization
    MutexTest  
    PostProgress<PROGRESS>
    Task that post a progress information
    ThreadActor
    Thread that do a threaded task ThreadedTask, ThreadedSimpleTask or ThreadedVerySimpleTask, then wait for an other one to do
    ThreadedSimpleTask<PARAMETER>
    Do a simple task.
    ThreadedTask<PARAMETER,RESULT,PROGRESS>
    Task do in separate thread
    Extends this class to have a good thread manager with ThreadManager.
    ThreadedVerySimpleTask
    Threaded task very simple.
    ThreadElement<PARAMETER,RESULT,PROGRESS>
    Describes a thread element.
    ThreadManager
    Thread manager.
    WaitingManager
    Manager for make waiting task for an specific event before play
